data.label: 腾讯客户端性能分析
data.description: 腾讯客户端性能分析（QAPM）是一款全方位定位检测 APP 应用性能的 SDK，其简单易用、并能提供多维度检测及分析，您只需简单的调用几个接口，就能对您的 APP 做全方位的性能检测。

data.label: Tencent Client Performance Analysis
data.description: Tencent Client Performance Analysis (QAPM) is an SDK for comprehensive detection of app performance, which is simple to use and provides multi-dimensional detection and analysis. You only need to call a few interfaces to perform comprehensive performance detection on your app.
